title: Epistola Thomæ Hobbes Malmsburiensis ad dominum Antonium à Wood authoreum Historie & antiquitatum Vniversitatis Oxoniensis, inserenda ad pag. 344, 345
author: Hobbes, Thomas, 1588-1679.
notes: Place and date of publication suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
"The broadside is Hobbes' enraged response to Dr. Fell's tampering with his biography in Anthony à Wood's History"--Note of bookseller, Stonehill. (NUC pre-1956 imprints.)
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
